products.title: Wireless Mouse
products.description: A comfortable and responsive wireless mouse with ergonomic design.

products.title: Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat suitable for all types of exercises and stretches.

products.title: Coffee Maker
products.description: Compact drip coffee maker with programmable timer and auto shut-off.

products.title: Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Over-ear Bluetooth headphones with noise cancellation and long battery life.

products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Durable, insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for hours.

reviews.comment: Great mouse, very comfortable to use for long periods.
Good quality mat, but a bit slippery on hardwood floors.
Makes excellent coffee, very easy to use.
Sound quality is amazing, and they are very comfortable.
Keeps my water cold all day, but the cap could be better.
